name: Momentuball
description: As of now each level requires a certain number of points that you can earn by covering large distances in the air or by traveling beyond a certain speed or changing rotation as you re-enter water after jumping out. There's also Items that must be collected in them. I haven't created a controls instructions yet but will do so soon. All the levels are open from the beginning because I considered this game more of a sport instead of adventure based on how it reminded me of racing and skate-boarding.
